droplet: The name of the droplet to create/manage, example: 'computer01'
droplet_region: The region slug for the droplet, example: 'nyc3'
droplet_size: The size of the droplet to create, example: 's-1vcpu-2gb'
droplet_image: The image slug for the droplet to create, example: 'ubuntu-22-04-x64'
dns_hostname: the DNS name to point to the droplet as an A Record; the zone must already be in your Digital Ocean account
mongo_admin_user: the username to use when connecting to Mongo
mongo_admin_password: the password to use when connecting to Mongo
